original_title: Dude, You Need to Stop Dancing
overview: Punk rockers Boys Night Out -- Connor Lovat-Fraser, Jeff Davis, Brian Southall and Dave Costa -- enjoy a clever jab at stereotypical band breakup scenarios and private angst-ridden interviews in this hilarious mockumentary. The release also features live concert footage filmed in March 2006 at the Opera House in Toronto, plus music videos for "Medicating" and "I Got Punched in the Nose for Sticking My Face in Other People's Business."
title: Dude, You Need to Stop Dancing
